titles.title: Hold the LYNE Act
A bill to prohibit the research and development, production, and deployment of the Trident D5 low-yield nuclear warhead, and for other purposes.
Hold the Low-Yield Nuclear Explosive Act
Hold the LYNE Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Hold the Low-Yield Nuclear Explosive Act or the Hold the LYNE Act
This bill prohibits the use of funds authorized for the Department of Defense or the Department of Energy (DOE) for the development, production, or deployment of the Trident D5 low-yield nuclear warhead. It also repeals authorization for DOE to modify or develop a low-yield nuclear warhead for submarine-launched ballistic missiles.
